website_summaries.verdict: Not your average pan, this stoneware pan from Le Creuset exudes quality, elegance, and style.
pros: Safely goes in the oven, microwave, and freezer
Material resists chips and cracks, though they are possible
cons: Although made of sturdy stoneware, it is possible to drop and break this pan

customer_reviews.title: Great color, cooks beautifully but flawed
customer_reviews.text: Received as a Christmas present from my husband. It’s beautiful, bakes well but lid doesn’t fit right and wobbles. Not sure it isn’t a “reject” piece or what but definitely sub par for what I expect from Le Creuset. I have several of their pieces and it’s not up to their standards.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cook & Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing this casserole dish for quite sometime. When my cheap one broke, I used it as an excuse to splurge. I have a small family, so it’s perfect to make a few baked chicken thighs or a decent sized lasagna. I used the lid instead of foil. It worked perfectly. The best part is, washing was a breeze. Just a little soaking got everything off!
customer_reviews.author: Discount Queen

customer_reviews.title: These are Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have another one in yellow and wanted two so we could have two casseroles in the fridge at a time. If you're buying it because you're thinking it's super big, however, it's not. Just average. Very happy with this purchase and my husband loves the extra leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy dish
customer_reviews.text: The dish arrived with no damaged. It's a little heavy however worth the cost and plusI I like too cook constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos H. Davila Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great baking pans
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. The color is brilliant and heats the food very evenly. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Donald

customer_reviews.title: Second time was a charm
customer_reviews.text: Had to return first one, receive broken. Second order was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Denise Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love how evenly food is cooked in this stoneware.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Street

customer_reviews.title: Love love love le creuset
customer_reviews.text: I love this dish and the fact that it is covered it is perfect. I have a couple of uncovered ones but this is greAt to bake in serve and then cover and put in the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie lesley

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this brand but that it really is well made with great uses and vibrant colors. Very well packaged and arrived quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: Dita

customer_reviews.title: Oh so lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I've not cooked in it yet, but it is certainly beautiful. It is HEAVY, not for lightweights! The lid alone is very heavy. Very pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was very disappointed when I received this to find out that it was made in Thailand when I thought I was getting the real Le Creuset made in France. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: bourel

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: This product was shipped with very little packaging to protect it from breakage. There was only 1 piece of crumpled up paper so the lid was broken. I returned it and ordered once again, hoping that the packaging would be better. Not so--this time it was in so many pieces that I did not even open it and returned it with the UPS driver. Too bad--I was really looking forward to using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: This is not LC quality
customer_reviews.text: While this appears in the photos to be nice heavy LC enamel over iron, it is actually just light earthenware. I have broken other LC earthenware pieces in the past. They crack if the oven is too hot. If you still want one, Sur La Table has these on clearance for $55. They aren't advertising them on line. You have to go to one of their stores.
customer_reviews.author: JDavis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my 2nd dish, same color and size. (let me just say slippery dish and wet hands over granite counter, not a great combination!! ) But I LoVE this dish so much, I immediately ordered a new one. Not to small, not to big. I like the deepness of it. Color is pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice - top quality and cleans out well even from the most stubborn bake.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Hammerman

customer_reviews.title: The best bakeware out there
customer_reviews.text: I love Le Creuset stoneware and bought this used and to my surprise, it arrived looking brand new with the inside cardboard inset still in place. You just can't go wrong with this brand. It's heavy, substantial and bakes things like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: BettePage

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: Need to point out that its MADE IN CHINA - NOT WORTH THE PRICE -
customer_reviews.author: lance siegel

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dish.
customer_reviews.text: Nice for small lasagna. Cleans up nicely in dishwasher. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cookware and matched recipients' kitchen décor well
customer_reviews.text: All Le Creuset pieces purchased as gifts. Excellent Cookware and matched recipients' kitchen décor well.
customer_reviews.author: NanaJ

customer_reviews.title: They loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son and his wife. They loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful pieces.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful pieces.....can use in microwave , freeze or oven....perfect size for 2 people. Very hard to find....thank you Amazon for having them
customer_reviews.author: C. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We love this pan! Had been looking for a large one with a lid for awhile. Expensive, but worth it...and it cleans right up super easy.
customer_reviews.author: MuffinandPuffin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice casserole
customer_reviews.text: Really high quality casserole dish. Really like the orange color. Got it on sale half off so it was a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T. Kolkovich

customer_reviews.title: ... so I had to buy another one but I love it!
customer_reviews.text: It did not hold as much as I thought it would so I had to buy another one but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional item but on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.text: Top quality item. Gave one to all my kids for Christmas. Expensive, but will become a keepsake.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis A. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles
customer_reviews.text: First one I got was returned because the lid wobbled a lot. Second one has same issue. Called Le Creuset and they confirmed this should not be happening. Another one to send back. Not a great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Far superior to all other brands
customer_reviews.text: This brand stands on its reputation. Absolut quality. Flawless. Super fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Genie

product_meta.title: Le Creuset Heritage Stoneware Covered Rectangular Casserole, 4-Quart, Indigo
product_meta.description: Size:4 qt. (12" x 9")| Color:IndigoWith its secure lid, The heritage stoneware covered casserole is a convenient choice for transporting dishes to parties, potlucks and picnics. Not only does the stoneware lid provide an effective moisture and heat lock for the dish, but it prevents spills and protects contents until they are ready to serve. Adding to the versatility of this classic design, It's also useful as a marinating dish for lengthy cuts of meat before grilling or roasting in the oven.
feature_bullets: Unmatched thermal resistance — safe for freezer, microwave, oven, broiler and dishwasher
The package length of the product is 15.6 inches
The package width of the product is 10.1 inches
The package height of the product is 5.3 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars110 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
